about_the_game:
ThunderLash - Put Your Tactical Skills to the Test!
ThunderLash is an exhilarating online FPS experience for competitive players. Combining tactical gameplay, fast-paced action, and strategic decision-making, the game challenges you and your friends to intense battles.
Prove Yourself on the Battlefield:
ThunderLash offers a unique competitive experience with three distinct game modes:
Competitive: Fight alongside your team for victory and prove your skills. Each match is a thrilling challenge that requires strategic planning and flawless teamwork.
Free-for-All: Battle to be the last one standing and demonstrate your marksmanship. This mode offers a deadly arena that tests your individual skills and reflexes.
Team Deathmatch: Dominate your enemies alongside your team and achieve the highest score. This mode emphasizes the importance of teamwork and requires you to coordinate your actions with your friends.
Stunning Visuals and 3 Unique Maps:
ThunderLash features a visually stunning interface and three distinct maps. Each map offers a unique gameplay experience that requires different tactics and strategies. Narrow streets, wide open spaces, and strategic points make each map a unique battleground.
Fight Alongside Your Friends:
The in-game communication system allows you to coordinate with your friends, develop tactics, and work together for victory. Team up with your friends, devise strategies, and outmaneuver your enemies.
ThunderLash awaits!
Tactical Gameplay: Outsmart your enemies using your skills. Each map requires you to employ different tactics and strategies.
Fast-Paced Action: Experience thrilling battles every moment. You need to make split-second decisions and utilize your reflexes.
Strategic Decision-Making: Achieve victory with the right tactics. Utilize your map knowledge and tactical intelligence to outmaneuver your enemies.
Competitive Environment: Compete against other players and become the best. Climb the ranks and prove your skills to the world.
Start playing ThunderLash now and claim your place on the battlefield!

movies.name: The story of an online FPS game, ThunderLash.

name: ThunderLash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD kullanmanız önerilir.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX950
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD kullanmanız önerilir.

short_description: ThunderLash: Put your tactical skills to the test!Fight alongside your friends in a fast-paced action, strategic decision-making, and competitive environment. Prove your skills in three different game modes and claim your place on the battlefield in ThunderLash!
